text: Folsom is an unincorporated community in Callaway County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. ==History== A post office called Folsom was established in 1887, and remained in operation until 1905. The community was named after First Lady Frances Folsom Cleveland. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Callaway County, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Folsom, Missouri
